resources.string: The IFW rules written by this application have been cleared. Please submit again to take effect.
The IFW rules are in force

This application requires Root permission to work properly.

You need to install Magisk and enable the Riru - Core and Riru - IFW Enhance modules.

The IFW rule created by this application will be cleared every time when this application starts and you clicked "Get it", and will be regenerated after you click submit.
Clean up, please restart the application
App Developer： hjthjthjt\nRiru - Core Developer：Rikka\nRiru - IFW Enhance Developer: Kr328
